conditions.short_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
conditions.full_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

area_forecast.forecast: Snjór hefur sjatnað og styrkst í hlýindum undanfarið. Spáð er lítilsháttar snjókomu til fjalla en rigningu á láglendi.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Síðustu daga hefur snjór sjatnað og styrkst í hlýindum. Eldri snjór ætti að vera stöðugur víðast hvar en spáð er einhverri snjókomu til fjalla næstu daga en rigningu á láglendi. Nýi snjórinn getur orðið óstöðugur þar sem hann nær að safnast fyrir en ekki gert ráð fyrir nema ltilum flóðum.
area_forecast.weather: SV-átt og smávegis él til fjalla á sunnudag. Rigning á láglendi. SA-átt á mánudag og lítilsháttar úrkoma, snjókoma efst í fjöll.

area_forecast.forecast: Little precipitation in the next days. Older snow is considered stable.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
area_forecast.snow_condition: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Older snow is expected to be stable but some new snow could come over the next days but rain at lowlands. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates but only small avalanches are expected
area_forecast.weather: Hæglætis veður og hiti við frostmark. Möguleiki á lítilsháttar éljum á stöku stað. SV-átt og él á sunnudag. NA-átt á mánudag, úrkomulítið.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. It will snow a bit over the weekend and small slabs could form, especially on easterly aspects. Loose snow or small wet avalanches may occur where the sun reaches and due to warming temperatures.
area_forecast.weather: Breytilegar áttir og snjókoma með köflum um helgina. Gæti skafið í austlægar hlíðar á sunnudag. Kólnar dálítið í veðri.

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Snow is considered mostly stable. A little snow is forecasted at high elevations over the weekend.
area_forecast.weather: Breytilegar áttir næstu daga og úrkoma með köflum; snjókoma til fjalla en rigning eða slydda á láglendi. Kólnar dálítið um helgina.

weather_forecast.forecast: Variable winds and snow at times at high elevations in most parts of the country.
